scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send: SUBSCRIBE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 SUBSCRIBE Contact: <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=tcp> Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Event: presence Supported: eventlist User-Agent: Digium Salad Panther Accept: application/rlmi+xml Accept: application/pidf+xml Accept: multipart/related Expires: 3600 Content-Length: 0
